A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Love that Star Wars is changing! The anger of fans with this film no doubt comes down to the shattering of their expectations with the Skywalker line. This film does things other Star Wars films haven't. And because of it\, we get what I've been waiting for since Disney bought Lucasfilm: We're seeing Star Wars break from it's mold. We're seeing it stop pandering to nostalgia. TFA and Rogue One had to do this to lure everyone in and then BAM! here comes The Last Jedi. A fantastic romp with deep characterization. It's all bad people. Everyone fails. That's an act two for you. Can't wait for act three!
